name: Magic & Magnums
description:
When the dead-broke mercenaries at Gray Water discovered a portal to the fantasy worlds of Yggdrasil they thought their money problems were solved. The mission was simple: deploy battle-hardened roughnecks and liberate as many golden eggs as possible. But they didn’t expect an organized resistance from golems, and dragons, and orcs - oh my!

You play as Airman Prow, flying close air support in your UH-1H Huey Bushranger. Armed with the best weapons the black market can buy your job is to keep GS-23 soldiers safe, and protect the Golden Liberation and Egg Extraction team.

But the orcs just keep…
on…
coming!

** Special Sale Price through Tom Selleck's Birthday at the end of January! **

Magic & Magnums has more than enough fantasy mayhem to keep the barrels smoking:
* Orcs, orcs, and more orcs: Ax wielding Peons, Armored Pigits, and Fearsome Praetorians.
* Fire bombing red dragons.
* Rocket slinging lava golems.
* Venom vomiting venus dragon-traps.

No worries - you're armed to the teeth! Show those fairy-world freaks who’s in charge with:
* The wicked waist mounted M60 vulcan machine guns.
* A Baddie-busting Mk19 grendade launcher.
* The smoking destruction of a Blu-1B Napalm canister.
* Plus, Claymore perimeter mines, Kevalr vests, and active heat sinks.

Upgrade your ride, your weapons, and your squaddies with better and badder weapons, armor and stats!

(And for those in the know - this is the game formerly known as Stargate Gunship)
